meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Guatemala.
meanings.sent1: In Guatemala, you can buy many things with quezales.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for quezales at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of colorful quezales!
meanings.sent4: To him, money was not just paper, but a handful of quezales.
meanings.sent5: The sound of clinking quezales in his pocket made him feel rich.

meanings.definition: A type of bird found in Central America.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful quezales flew gracefully through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a pair of quezales perched on a branch.
meanings.sent3: The quezales chirped a cheerful tune in the morning.
meanings.sent4: Her colorful dress was as vibrant as the feathers of quezales.
meanings.sent5: The sight of quezales in flight was a breathtaking experience.
